items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable React component that mimics modern chat input fields. It supports dynamic text wrapping using a contentEditable div and displays a placeholder when the field is empty — perfect for messaging apps, chatbots, or support UIs.

items.content_html: MoopanKey's Wordlist Generator is a lightweight yet powerful tool designed to create custom password lists for ethical hacking, cybersecurity testing, and awareness training. Inspired by the wisdom of the ancient "Moopan" — the tribal guardian — this tool helps security enthusiasts simulate real-world password patterns to uncover weak credentials

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
